title: The meaning of green in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the color green in a dream. The color green represents religiosity, justice, and piety, as well as happiness, joy, and happy events. Green has many different shades and has a wavelength of 520-570 nanometers, which is the complementary color of carnation. The color green is usually soothing and it is also a color that expresses nature and green indicates calm and purity, so the appearance of the color green in a dream usually has many positive connotations and interpretations for the dreamer, so it has different visual interpretations. We will give you different instructions for seeing the color green in your dreams. Green color in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s green color in a dream. If the dreamer is a businessman, then the appearance of green color in the dream indicates profit in trade and large income. Green is the color that indicates excellence in learning, distinguished achievements, and high grades. The symbol of green color in a dream. Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi believes that the green color indicates a girl’s marriage and a decent and healthy life. Green color indicator: When you see the green color in a young man’s dream, this indicates that he will also marry a nice, beautiful, and religious girl. Al-Nabulsi said that the green color in a dream means that this year will be good and that The dreamer's life is full of joy. If the dreamer is currently suffering from health problems or illnesses, the green color in the dream means that God will recover soon. The meaning of a dream about the green color by Imam Al-SadiqThe meaning of the green color Imam Al-Sadiq said that the green color in a married woman's dream indicates stability The emotional and financial life of a woman. If the color green appears in a pregnant woman’s dream, this indicates the safety and good health of the newborn. The green color in a dream usually indicates that the dreamer has moved from one stage to a new stage, which is the best stage in the future. If the dreamer is worried And sad, green is the color that indicates the way to get rid of this sadness and get rid of it. Interpretation of the green color of porridge in a dream Green represents the final period, that is, the fulfillment of his dreams and goals. If a married woman sees green plants everywhere, this means that the woman’s life has undergone some fundamental changes Positivity, such as buying a new home or anything else. The meaning of the color green. If the color green appears in a man’s dream in the work environment, this means that the man has gotten rid of the enemies and problems he suffered in the past and is at the beginning of the stage of psychological peace. The color of Ibn Shaheen is green in Dream: When you find that a married or married child in a dream is wearing green clothes, this means that the child performed well in that study this year and his performance was better. If a married woman finds a green mattress in her bed, this indicates that she is pregnant. The green color indicates repentance from sins. The different meanings of green colors in a dream. Green is a symbol of health. Green color also symbolizes the dreamer's generosity, fame, and good character. Green color indicates the possibility of recovery from illness. Green means very good, livelihood, money, and offspring.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a flea in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a flea in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, especially since the flea is one of the animals that harms humans, and if one sees it in a dream, this vision is considered one of the most unpleasant visions that includes many connotations and meanings that differ from one person to another, and in this context we learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream. Sirin seeing a flea in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a flea in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The flea is considered one of the animals that always appear in a dream. It causes discomfort to the viewer, and of course this vision carries many different interpretations and interpretations, and in this context we will learn more about the interpretation of the dream of seeing a flea in a dream. Ibn Sirinho also: If you see a flea in a dream, then this vision shows a man characterized by many unpleasant qualities. Perhaps among them are malice and malice, and he also does many things in slandering others with lies and slander. While seeing a flea biting someone in a dream. This indicates abundance Money coming to him and comfort with God Almighty in the near future. In addition, the presence of a flea in a dream is a sign of a man’s weakness. While the presence of a blood flea in a dream is evidence that money is in the hands of a despicable person. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a city Amusement parks in a dream in detail. The interpretation of seeing a flea in a dream for a married woman, especially since this vision for a married woman includes interpretations that are often not good interpretations and carry bad connotations. In this context, we learn about the interpretation of seeing a flea in a dream for a married woman. It is also: If one sees a flea bite, this is a sign of anxiety. And anxiety. Also, seeing fleas in a dream is a sign of unpleasant news. Likewise, if a married woman sees fleas in a dream, this is evidence of the presence of many disagreements and quarrels between the spouses. If a married woman sees fleas in a dream, this is a sign of the presence of bad money. Legitimate. While if one sees killing fleas in a dream, this is a sign of changing life for the better and removing problems and fears. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a sacrifice in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of the dream of fleas in the hair for a single woman. It is one of the visions that many unmarried girls find disturbing, Of course, the interpretations it contains vary depending on the situation of the viewer, and among these lines: The interpretation of a dream about fleas in the hair for a single woman is also: The appearance of a flea in a dream for a girl, then this is a sign of the presence of a weak man present in her life during this period. In addition, if many fleas are seen In a dream for one girl. This is an indication of many bad girlfriends who were in the ocean for this girl’s life at that time. Also, seeing fleas in a dream for unmarried women is a sign that this girl will fall into deception and deception on the part of some people from Around her. Also, if a girl sees that she has been bitten by fleas. This dream is a sign that this girl will enter into a failed love story that will bring her many problems. See also: Interpretation

title: Interpretation of a dream about a brother in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFansInterpretation of a dream about a brother in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi, which is a brother in a dream, has many interpretations. As Ibn Sirin explained, the meanings associated with seeing a brother, some of which are good and some are unpleasant, and today we will clarify some of them. Interpretation of a dream about a brother by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a brother in a dream can mean A lot of money and a lot of sustenance. Seeing the birth of a brother in a dream is a sign of happy news that the dreamer will hear. If anyone sees the dream of a brother wearing new clothes, this indicates a change in the fortuneteller’s opinion in the near future. Seeing differences between brothers in a dream is a sign of love between them But this is in the absence of inheritance. Seeing a sick brother in a dream indicates problems and troubles that the dreamer faces. Dreaming about the death of a brother is a sign of longevity. Interpretation of a dream about a brother for a man: For a man to see in a dream that he killed his brother by some means, this bodes well, especially if he returns To life. Seeing an older brother in a dream is a sign of kindness, happiness and good luck. Seeing a younger brother in a dream is a sign of relief from stress and comfort. Interpretation of dreams for an unmarried brother in a dreamIf a girl sees in a dream that she wrote her book about her brother in a dream, then this A sign of goodness and happiness that the family will have. If a girl sees in a dream that the mother is giving birth to her brother, this indicates a new life in which the coming period will unfold. A brother in his dream is a sign of goodness, happiness and a new life. Interpretation of a dream about a brother for a married woman in a dream: Seeing a married woman In a dream, she marries her brother, showing the strong relationship between them and their strong love. Seeing a woman marrying her brother in a dream is good news about pregnancy and she will give birth to a son. Seeing a married woman burying her brother in a dream is evidence of an interruption between them and the differences that will arise between them. Interpretation of a brother’s dream about a pregnant woman in Dream: When a pregnant woman sees in a dream, the brother was smiling and happy, this is a sign of a male child that she will have. To see an older brother in a dream is pregnant, it is a sign of a lot of money that she will have in the near future. If a pregnant woman sees a younger brother in a dream, this means that she is hearing news Good. Interpretation of dreams about a brother in Nabulsi in a dream. Seeing a young man in a dream killing his brother indicates the benefit he will get from his brother. See hidden travel. The dream is evidence of the dreamer’s trip to one of the countries for work. Seeing a sick brother in a dream is evidence of the problems and difficulties he is going through in his life. And it is difficult to escape from it. Interpretation of a dream about a brother traveling in a dream. See the point: A brother’s journey. The sinner in a dream must repent and return to God and stay away from sins and disobedience. Seeing traveling in a dream symbolizes the beginning of a new work, through which the dreamer will achieve a lot of good. Seeing an unmarried brother traveling in a dream indicates An upcoming marriage. Seeing a sister about her brother in a dream. Seeing a sister about her brother in a dream shows a feeling of security. A pregnant woman. Everyone who sees her brother in a dream indicates that she will be immune to fatigue and new pressure.

title: Interpretation of a dream about war and missiles in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about war and missiles in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. It is one of the disturbing visions for some, in terms of its relationship to disputes with the enemy in addition to exposure to danger, especially if the presence of missiles in it is known to have a great ability to destroy both facilities and people, but we find that scholars Interpretation They have provided different interpretations related to the dream of war and missiles, as they have specific connotations between good and evil, and you will do so. Learn about this in our article: Interpretation of a dream about war and missiles in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about war and missiles in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing a projectile in a dream indicates the strength of the character of the dreamer and his deep thinking before making any decision, in addition to other connotations and meanings mentioned by interpretation scholars. We show you Some of them are in the following lines: In the case of a dreamer who sees in his dream a war with many war missiles and planes flying in the sky, this is a sign of achieving goals and achieving desires that he thought were difficult to achieve. Also, seeing a war in a dream and projectiles falling on the dreamer It symbolizes that he needs to make some changes in the things he does in his life and avoid doing bad things and harming others, and God Almighty knows the unseen. With reference to the dream of war and missiles, it symbolizes that the dreamer loves himself very much and tries in every way to protect himself from any dangers he is exposed to. Her. In addition to the recurring vision of war and missiles, this symbolizes that the dreamer lives in a bad psychological state and feels stressed and tensed by the events that are happening around him and that are negatively affecting his life and that God is higher and knows the invisible. See also: Interpretation of a dream about fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing war and missiles for a single girl. Seeing war and missiles for an unmarried girl carries a number of interpretations and meanings according to what scholars have interpreted. It is one of the dreams that worries her and urges her to seek her own interpretation, and we put before you some of the interpretations in The following points: Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream is a big war and missiles are being used against her. This indicates that there is someone who will marry her soon and that this person has high morals. Likewise for an unmarried girl, when she sees in her dream that she is participating in a war that contains missiles and modern equipment This is a sign that some happy things will happen and you will soon hear good news. We find that a single girl seeing war missiles at a distance from her indicates that some good positive changes will occur in the life of the dreamer, and God Almighty is Most High and knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about war for a married woman in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about war varies. For a married woman, unlike others, the dream carries several different meanings and interpretations, and it is noted that each of them is linked to the social status of the dreamer, in addition to the suggestions and symbols that carry the dream, such as: We find that the sign of a married woman when she dreams that her husband is defending himself in a war and she is on the side. title: Interpretation of a dream about Umrah by Ibn Sirin for single, married and pregnant women

preview.html: The dream of Umrah in a dream is one of the dreams that can be very promising for the soothsayer, so we will learn about its interpretation preferably according to the interpretation of the scholar Ibn Sirin. Seeing Umrah in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing Umrah in a dream as longevity, health, and blessings for the pioneer because it indicates To abundant and immeasurable sustenance. If the dreamer sees himself performing the Hajj or Umrah, this means that he will go to visit the Sacred House, as Umrah symbolizes in the dream comfort and the removal of anxiety and the situation will change from worse to better. Seeing or going to Umrah in a dream indicates the blessing of life and diet. The vision also symbolizes freedom from worries and problems, and whoever sees himself returning from Umrah, this is a sign of the success of that person in achieving his goals and dreams. If the opinion is unanimous, this is evidence of the success of that person in achieving his goals and dreams. His marriage to a fair girl is near, but if the dreamer is in debt, then the vision indicates the imminent repayment of his debts and the improvement of his financial condition. And whoever sees himself performing the rituals of Umrah, this indicates the goodness of the dreamer and the purity of his intentions, as it is evidence of repentance and a return to God. Interpretation of the dream of going for Umrah. Scholars interpreted it Interpretation of dreams: Going for Umrah in a dream indicates good deeds and trust in God, and sometimes it symbolizes short trips aimed at religious tourism or searching for a job opportunity. Whoever sees in his dream that he is performing Umrah and shouting loudly, this is evidence of repentance from sins and disobedience, as The vision symbolizes comfort and the death of worry. In the case of the fortuneteller’s illness, this is evidence of healing and recovery from the disease. Also, seeing him going for Umrah symbolizes a good ending and the fortuneteller regaining his strength and health and restoring his rights. The vision may indicate marriage soon or participation in new projects, and if the dreamer He suffers from diseases and enters the Kaaba from the inside, this means his death, but after sincere repentance and returning to the path of truth. And whoever sees that he has obtained part of the covering of the Kaaba, this is a sign that he will soon recover from illness. Interpretation of returning from Umrah in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he is returning from Umrah, as this symbolizes goodness, blessing, and the acquisition of a lot of food for the dreamer, in addition to longevity. The dreamer’s return from Umrah indicates the completion of his postponed work, achieving its goal, satisfying the need, and performing the obligatory duties. The intention of going for Umrah in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he intends to go to Umrah, this is evidence of the dreamer’s reluctance to commit sins and disobedience. The vision can be a signal to start new projects and earn a lot, and if the dreamer is single, this is evidence of his serious thinking about marriage. The vision also symbolizes volunteering for charitable work and helping others in solving their problems and crises, but if An unmarried woman saw this vision, as this is evidence of her repentance, abandoning sins, and returning to God. The symbol of Umrah in a single woman’s dream. A dream about Umrah in an unmarried woman’s dream is interpreted as positive changes that will occur in her life in the coming period, as the dream symbolizes the formation of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about asking for forgiveness in a dream or saying “I ask forgiveness from God” in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of the dream of seeking forgiveness in a dream through a website in the dream, and see the opinions of dream interpreters about seeing forgiveness in a dream or saying I seek forgiveness from God in a dream and what results from its interpretation of the dream of seeking. Repentance for single and married women. Interpretation of a dream of forgivenessRequesting forgiveness in a dream is one of the beautiful visions that reassure the dreamer and has many interpretations, but let us get to know together the interpretation of asking for forgiveness in a dream? The interpretation of a dream of repentance in a dream refers to sustenance or responding to the fortune teller’s prayer, and it is said that it indicates repentance. Repentance in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s return to God and his repentance for sins, disobedience, and feelings of regret. Interpretation of repentance in a dream, if there is fear in it, it symbolizes hope, and silence about repentance is despair. And God knows best. Repentance in a dream for someone who was rich is an increase in his money, repentance in a dream for someone who was poor, the arrival of livelihood for him. Repentance in a dream for the sick is relief from his worries, and for the sick it is healing for him and his repentance for the sinner. Repentance of another person in a dream indicates regret for words that involve crying, And the forgiveness of all Muslims indicates the funeral prayer. Seeing forgiveness in a dream, if he laughs, is a mockery of the words of God, and mocking the request for forgiveness is foolishness. Interpretation of a dream of forgiveness and crying is a sign of good news of the coming of relief to the seer. Interpretation of dreams of asking for forgiveness for something the dreamer sees in a dream, in reality he sees something immoral. The interpretation of a dream asking for forgiveness for the deceased in a dream can symbolize the deceased’s need for prayer. Advice to ask for forgiveness in a dream and advice to ask for forgiveness in a dream, if it is about a woman, may indicate that she committed an obscenity, such as what happened to the wife of Aziz in the story of Joseph, peace be upon him. This interpretation is taken from the saying of God Almighty: “And ask forgiveness for your sins, for you were among the sinners.” And the interpretation of a dream that advises asking for forgiveness in a dream with all interpretations shows goodness, justice and fairness in matters. Seeing a familiar person in a dream advising the seer is a sign of God’s love for the visionary and that he wants good for him. If the priest accepts the advice to ask for forgiveness in a dream, it is better for him and justice in his affairs, but if he refuses, it is Arrogant. Seeking forgiveness after prayer answers the supplication if the dreamer is facing the Qiblah. Seeing the father or mother asking for forgiveness in a dream may indicate their hope for the well-being of their children. title: Buying meat, cooking it, and eating it in a dream for a married, pregnant, and single woman

preview.html: My friends, we continue our research journey on the meaning of seeing meat in a dream, after we learned in the previous article the meaning of cooked, grilled and raw meat in a dream. Interpretation of buying meat in a dream Buying meat in a dream from a butcher or butcher benefits the dreamer, and this is the case when a man sees himself buying quantities A large number of slaughtered sheep. It is praiseworthy in the interpretation to buy meat from a butcher if the latter appears in a dream happy and not gloomy, and it is not praiseworthy in a dream to see a person as if he were a butcher or a butcher whose clothes have been soiled. Buying meat in a married woman’s dream is a good omen, because it often expresses the appearance of something good such as pregnancy, and God knows best. Buying meat in a married woman’s dream represents pregnancy, because the two words consist of the same letters, and most dreamers adopt this method of interpreting dreams ( Similarity in pronunciation). Buying meat in a bachelor’s dream sometimes indicates marriage, because weddings and weddings in the highlands are not devoid of meat, and meat is perhaps the most important feature or ingredient. It is said in some Arab countries: “When do we eat meat?” This phrase means: When is the wedding? Or when we celebrate newlyweds. The interpretation of dreams depends largely on popular culture because it forms the collective subconscious. Buying lamb in a pregnant woman’s dream sometimes indicates the presence of a male child, as does camel meat, and buying chicken meat indicates the presence of a female, and God knows best. Interpretation of cooking and cooking meat In a dream, cooking in visions is good, unless it is related to meat forbidden by law, such as pork. As for cooking lamb, mutton, goats, or sheep, it is very good because they are livestock, and it means food and health. And goodness. As for cooking forbidden or unacceptable meat, such as pork, hyena meat, birds of prey, crows, or owls, this is not recommended in the interpretation of dreams, and some of them indicate deception, betrayal, or scheming. Cooking pork in a dream indicates a prohibited work or unjust gain. Legal and may also indicate illness. Cooking halal meat in a married woman’s dream is a sign of psychological comfort, just like sheep or cow meat, which in her interpretation is halal livelihood or money. If an unmarried woman sees that she is preparing food that contains cooked meat and the meat is Halal, this is interpreted as marriage, and halal meat can indicate profit or livelihood, and meat is well prepared. Interpretation of eating meat in a dream: In a dream, there is praise for eating cooked meat because it is an expression of completing a matter or agreeing on it, and eating halal meat indicates concealment, obedience, and blessing. It is abhorrent in the interpretation that the sleeper sees in his dream that he is eating chicken meat or assumes that he is not slaughtered in the Islamic way (especially for Muslims only), and this in the interpretation indicates that food coming from an evil source. Raw meat is praised in the interpretation when you only see it without eating it, and it is a reference in the dream to money and fresh meat from halal meat, which indicates quick money in its collection. The unmarried woman

title: I dreamed that I was eating fried fish

preview.html: I dreamed that I ate fried fish in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Fish contain many important nutrients for the human body such as proteins, vitamins, etc. Fried fish is one of the best and most delicious ways to catch, which is being prepared, and today through this article we will present For the great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I ate fried fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing fried fish in a dream, and it indicates the dreamer’s death in His life is for livelihood and travel, and God knows best. Seeing that he is eating fried fish and it tastes delicious in a dream indicates that the dreamer feeds righteous children, and God knows best. Fried fish forks in a dream indicates that there are some problems between the dreamer and his family that may lead to discord, and God knows best. Frying fish in oil in a dream. Announces His financial situation improved in the coming period. Burnt fried fish in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer was seriously ill, and God knows best. Seeing a lot of fried fish in a dream. The fortuneteller showed good fortune and luck, and God knows best. See another interpretation: Names of fish species. I dreamed that I ate fried fish in the Imam’s dream. Al-Sadiq Explanation of Imam Al-Sadiq Seeing eating fish in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve all his ambitions and goals in life. I see in a dream that I am eating fried fish. It also indicates that the fortuneteller heard happy news about his life in the coming period, and God knows best. Fried fish in a dream. It indicates that the fortuneteller has achieved a lot. Of profits and gains after a lot of effort and work. Seeing a dead person eating fried fish in a dream indicates that the dead person was a righteous man with good morals, and God knows best. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing fried fish in a dream. I dreamed that I ate fried fish in a dream for a single woman. Seeing women alone eating Delicious fried fish in a dream indicates the approaching date of her marriage to a person who has a lot of money and has many good qualities. Eating spoiled fried fish in a woman’s dream indicates many worries and anxieties in her life. Preparing fried fish in one dream indicates her marriage in the coming period, and God knows best. I dreamed that I ate fried fish in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman greedily eating fried fish in a dream says that she will create her own business and will achieve great success and profits. Eating fried fish in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is jealous of some people around her, and God knows best. Fried fish in a dream Married woman: It indicates that there are many disagreements between her and her husband that may lead to divorce. I dreamed that I ate fried fish in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman eating delicious fried fish in a dream says that she and her child’s health after birth, and God knows best. Buying fried fish in a pregnant woman’s dream announces that she will give birth to a boy. And God knows best. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream. We are happy to see a better reception

title: Interpretation of a dream about taking clothes from someone

preview.html: But interpreters have another opinion, which is that the dream of taking clothes from someone reflects the psychological state of the pioneer, as it shows everything that is going on in the dreamer’s mind and what he is thinking about. However, we find that its interpretation differs from one person to another. Interpretation of the dream of taking clothes from someone It is said that the dream of taking clothes from someone A person in a dream. It can be evidence that the Almighty God will bless the dreamer with a lot of money and livelihood. It is said that seeing the dream was taking clothes from a person in a dream and they were made of wool. This shows that the monarch is a religious person, with good morals and good qualities, and is ready to perform rituals of worship and duties in The right time. Interpreters reported that seeing a dream about taking clothes from someone in a dream was black in color. This shows that the dreamer is an honest and respectable person who also has integrity and good morals. Seeing a dream about taking clothes from someone in a dream that were green in color. This could be a sign that the dreamer wants to get closer From God Almighty as he walks on the path of repentance and righteousness. Seeing a dream of taking clothes from someone in a dream, and their color was red. The dreamer carries many responsibilities on his shoulders, but he no longer has the ability to bear them after that. Also, a dream of receiving clothes from a person in The dream was white. The viewer is in a good psychological state. If you dream of taking clothes from someone in a dream, this symbolizes that his appearance was simple. The dreamer makes many wrong decisions that negatively affect his life. Interpreters also say that seeing a dream Taking clothes from someone in a dream was one of the most important things. It aims to The dreamer will undergo many positive changes in his life. It is said that dreaming of taking clothes from someone in a dream had a high status. This could be evidence that the dreamer will get a big promotion in his field. It is also said He dreams of taking clothes from someone in a dream. It could be evidence that the dreamer lives a happy and peaceful life. Seeing a dream of taking clothes from someone in a dream and that was not appropriate for the scale. This could be evidence that the viewer does not have much confidence in himself or his abilities, but they are almost non-existent. See also: Interpretation of seeing clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of receiving children’s clothes from someone. It is said that dreaming of taking children’s clothes from a person in a dream. It could be evidence that the priest God Almighty will grant him many good things and sustenance in his life. Interpreters also reported that seeing a dream of taking Children's clothes from someone. It can be evidence that the dreamer will earn a living very soon, whether in his personal or professional life. Seeing a dream of taking children's clothes from a person in a dream who was dead. This can be evidence that the fortuneteller will get a lot of money in the coming period. Also The dream of taking children’s clothes from someone in a dream indicates that they were dirty. To me, the viewer is mentally unstable as a result of the problems and difficulties he was exposed to. Interpretation of the dream of carrying clothes from one person to another It is said: Seeing a dream of getting clothes from someone for an unmarried girl. It could be You will hear a lot of good news

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing mangoes in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a mango in a dream The dream carries many interpretations and meanings, some of which may indicate kindness, nourishment, and the fulfillment of the dream, and others express problems and judgments, and the interpretation depends on certain matters such as the viewer’s condition in reality and the details of the vision. Seeing a mango in a dream The interpretation of seeing a mango in a dream indicates that The fortuneteller will receive good news in the coming period that will make him happy for a long time. If in reality the dreamer is suffering from many problems and crises and he sees in his dream that he is eating a mango, this conveys good news to the dreamer that he will get rid of all the crises he is going through and worries and sorrows will be present. Lost.If the dreamer sees that he is cutting a mango into cubes, this is a sign that good things will soon happen to the dreamer and comfort will come to his life. Eating a cup of mango is a sign that you will get a lot of money in a very short time and it will come from a legitimate source. Seeing a mango wilted or spoiled is evidence that the viewer is exposed to some crises and problems in his life, as well as an increase in worries and difficulties. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: A website about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing mangoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, mangoes in a dream symbolize the joy and comfort that the dreamer will feel soon. He also mentioned that eating mangoes indicates the death of worries and sorrows and the return of peace to life. If one sees that mango fruits are green, then This vision expresses the strength of the dreamer’s personality and his ability to balance his work and social life, and this is what distinguishes him. Seeing a mango in a dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams and goals and the dreamer’s ability to reach his goal and what he wants. If one sees that the mango is yellow in a dream, this means that in his life he is exposed to hatred from some people close to him, and the rotten mango shows the failure that will happen to the mango in his life and his suffering. From many. Difficulties, problems, and the presence of some obstacles that prevent him from achieving his dreams. Seeing mangoes in a dream for Nablus: The dreamer will see that worms come out of the mango, this is not good at all and means that the person will be exposed to many problems in his life and during the coming period he may hear some bad news. Eating Mango, noting that its taste is neither good nor bitter, indicates the anxiety and pain that the dreamer is going through, and he will not be able to escape from these problems except after suffering severe pain and sadness. Seeing mangoes in a single woman’s dream. For an unmarried girl, seeing mangoes in a dream is evidence of achieving Goals, dreams and things that a girl wanted and sought, seeing a good ripe mango is a sign of great success that the girl will achieve during the next day. a period. If she is a student, she gets great grades and achieves distinction. Seeing mango juice and enjoying its taste is good news for the girl that there are good things out there.
